summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Remy Human Hair Pieces Front Clip in Hair #1B Natural Black Fringe Hair Extensions with Hair Temples Review Date: 2018/10/18 Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Installation Type': 'Clip-In', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '9 x 1 x 1 inches; 0.48 Ounces', 'UPC': '615517482166'} Review Text: I think this might work for people with smaller heads or smaller faces but I felt it wasn’t wider enough or thick enough to look good on me. The hair was very soft and real looking though! Review Title: Not very much hair Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: JPNK 10PCS Makeup tool set, Blender Sponges& Air cushion puff&Sponge Holder for Blending Liquid, Cream or Flawless Powder Cosmetics Review Date: 2019/12/27 Store: JPNK Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'JPNK', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Foundation,Concealer,Blender', 'Package Dimensions': '8.5 x 5.4 x 2.3 inches; 5.61 Ounces'} Review Text: You never know what you're gonna get with some of these beauty sponges, but this is definitely one of the good sets.

The sponges are actually soft and don't absorb as much product as other sponges. I recently tried another brand that looked exactly the same but they were so hard and rubbery. These are soooo much softer in comparison. I don't feel like I'm softly punching my face like I do with the others😂

Very easy to clean, after use and have no weird smell or anything. I haven't used the puffs or brush yet but I'm going to attempt to use the puffs for powder or maybe even jelly products. The brush would probably work well for concealer or eyeshadow primer. It has soft bristles and a solid handle.

Overall I think this is an awesome quality set for a great price!! Review Title: Higher quality beauty sponges than other brands! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: SAMYANG ABOUTME Red Recipe Super Cleansing Balm 3.04 oz. (90ml) - Soft Melting Milk Texture Makeup Cleansing Balm, Mineral Contained Nourishing & Soothing Cleansing, Rose Scented Review Date: 2019/12/30 Store: Samyang Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '3.66 x 3.39 x 2.36 inches; 5.57 Ounces'} Review Text: I tried this a few times and couldn't help but feeling like it left residue on my face. I end up using my normal face wash afterwards to feel properly cleansed.

To be fair I don't wear much face makeup so perhaps this might work better for someone that wears foundation. I did try to remove my eye makeup with this balm and it was too greasy/thick and also stung my eyes, whereas my micellar water won't do that.

The scent is a nice clean rose scent and I like the packaging, but I don't think I'll continue to use this. Seems like more work than is necessary and kinda makes me feel like it will clog my pores in the long run... Review Title: Feels like it creates an extra step... Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: [moonshot] Cream Paint Lightfit Air 3g - Blackpink Lisa Makeup Kpop Kbeauty Cosmetics, Airy Velvet Texture Matte Lip Makeup, Long Lasting Natrual Daily Lip Color (501 Almond Rose) Review Date: 2020/03/10 Store: Moonshot Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Moonshot', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Finish Type': 'Cream', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting,Brightening,Makeup'} Review Text: A pretty MLBB velvety lip color. The formula isn't nearly as drying as typical matte liquid lips. More of a velvety mousse like texture.

I have medium tan skin and I'd say this is a nude pink shade on me so it may be a bit light for deeper skin tones.

I discovered you can also use this as a cheek color as well! I dab a bit on the back of my hand and apply it from there. It's pretty pigmented on the cheeks so starting with less is better. Review Title: Can also be used as cream blush!:) Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Hair Scrunchies for women,Including 3 Pcs Long Silk Satin Hair Scarf & 3 Pcs Bunny Ear Scrunchies & 3 Pcs Elastic Hair Bands Scrunchy and 7Pcs Pearl Hair Clips,(16Pcs/9Colors) Review Date: 2020/04/10 Store: Suptikes Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Material': 'Pearl, Silk', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'Suptikes', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5 x 5 x 0.7 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 5 x 0.7 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '760635003608'} Review Text: These scrunchies look great in person, especially the plain scrunchies, theyre a beautiful silk like material that has some shine to it. The plain ones also have a heavy duty elastic in them. I have super thick long hair and these do a great job of keeping my hair in a bun.

Ive definitely overpaid for scrunchies at urban outfitters when these are just as nice if not nicer for sooo much cheaper. They're great!:)

The little barettes are just okay, I find they pull my hair but the scrunchies are totally worth it. Review Title: Super cute plus great deal!! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly, Top Japanese Makeup Remover, Gentle Skin Cleanser, Mild Floral Fragrance, Non-Greasy, 7.8 Ounce Review Date: 2020/04/28 Store: Bioré Product Description: ['Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly is a non-greasy makeup remover that removes dirt and impurities from deep below the surface of your skin. This top Japanese makeup remover glides on gently and leaves no sticky residue. Formulated with conditioning beauty essence, this jelly leaves skin feeling moisturized and free of makeup. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.'] Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '1.56 x 2.5 x 7.25 inches; 10.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': '28077_obs', 'UPC': '019100264557', 'Manufacturer': 'Kao USA Inc.'} Review Text: Was interested in what this was going to feel like but I guess "jelly" really is the closest consistency to describe this.

It more viscous than water and has a bit of "bounce" to it but doesn't feel oily or greasy. I apply it straight on my face, rub it in a bit, then add a bit of water to my hands, lather, then rub again. Then rinse k

I have combo skin with drier cheeks and this doesn't leave my skin feeling stripped or dry. Still feels moisturized.

This product smells of roses pretty strongly but I actually love the way it smells so I don't mind at all.

Wouldn't really recommend for eye makeup though, I did find it to sting a bit so I'm just gonna stick to micellar for my eye makeup.

Hope this review helps!:) Review Title: Melts away makeup, smells great Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Queendom Unlashed Mascara | Volumizing and Lengthening | Boosts Lash Length | Vegan, Cruelty Free, Paraben Free Review Date: 2020/06/04 Store: Queendom Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '5.28 x 0.94 x 0.63 inches; 0.85 Ounces'} Review Text: I have pretty long and decently full eyelashes so this mascara worked well for me as a daily mascara.

Cute packaging, nice slim shape with cute design.

I didn't find it to be too volumizing, but it does a good job at defining and lengthening.

Formula was not very wet from first opening so this may dry out faster than others if not used up.

My main issue with this mascara is the hard plastic applicator. It has longer and shorter hard bristles along the sides. I'm by no means a beginner with mascara, but for some reason I've poked my eye with this mascara applicator a couple of times already. The bristles just seem really hard and sharp!

This could just be me having a problem for whatever reason, but thought I'd mention.

Hope this review is helpful! Review Title: Decent mascara but VERY hard pokey applicator! Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Cuckoo Eyelashes 100% handmade 3D Faux Mink Lashes 4 Pairs/set … (Cuckoo 309) Review Date: 2020/06/28 Store: Cuckoo Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Cuckoo', 'Material': 'Silk, Faux Mink', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.91 x 4.33 x 0.39 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.91 x 4.33 x 0.39 inches; 1.87 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Cuckoo 309', 'UPC': '733430907945'} Review Text: (307) These lases are a little more dense so they definitely give the look of wearing false lashes, in kind of a more dated kind of way. I feel like the more spread out and whispy lashes are a lot more trendy these days. Band is quite thick also. Besides the band, the lashes themselves are pretty good quality and don't have a plastic sheen to them which is great. Price and quality is comparable to drugstore.

(309) Also have a thicker band but are much more Whispy and have that fluffy instagram lash to them. Very pretty! I like these a lot better than the 307's. I'd give these a 5 and a 307 a 3 so since they're the same brand, I will average the review to a 4.

Hope this review is helpful! Review Title: Dense, thicker band Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Color Me Cosmetics Gel Manicure Kit with LED Lamp - DIY Gel Nail Starter Set with Prep, Base and Top Coat, 2 Gel Polish Colors & Nail Tools - Beginner Nail Kit with Everything You Need Made in USA* Review Date: 2020/07/30 Store: Color Me Cosmetics Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Color Me Cosmetics', 'Included Components': 'Top Coat, Nail File', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Package Dimensions': '8.6 x 7.6 x 2.7 inches; 1.4 Pounds'} Review Text: The polishes in this set work wonderfully and the packaging is very nice and would make an excellent gift! Unfortunately I bumped the lamp off my table and it fell about 3 feet and stopped working...I didn't think it was much of a fall so I was pretty surprised it didn't turn on anymore.

The lamp was compact and easy to use, fit one hand at a time. Fortunately I have another lamp but pretty bummed this one broke so easily.:/ Review Title: Great little set but unfortunately the light broke very easily:( Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: invisibobble Sprunchie Spiral Hair Ring - True Black - Scrunchie Stylish Bracelet, Strong Elastic Grip Coil Accessories for Women - Gentle for Girls Teens and Thick Hair Review Date: 2020/12/15 Store: invisibobble Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'invisibobble', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Item Weight': '2 Grams', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '2.83 x 2.8 x 0.87 inches; 0.07 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'IB-SP-HP10001'} Review Text: I've tried the regular ones and love those. These don't stretch quite as well and feel a bit tighter when I wrap it around. I think they're alright but I prefer the normal ones much more. Review Title: Prefer the regular ones Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Skinmed Glow Cell BB Cream to Control Sebum with Natural Ingredients 50 ml - 1.7 Ounce Review Date: 2021/02/02 Store: Ph. Drop Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Ph. Drop', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Acne prone,oily,sensitive,all skin types', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.81 x 1.26 x 6.3 inches; 1.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '880128810633'} Review Text: I have a medium tan skin tone and this did not work for me at all. It's waaaay too light. Definitely meant for fair to light medium skin tones. This stuff is pretty pigmented so I wouldn't try it if you think it might be too light. It probably will be. Goes on pretty opaque and pigmented, it's almost a light/medium weight foundation. It does go in silky smooth and has a nice finish. I also like the pump and packaging. A bit of a scent to it, but it's not too bad. Wish they made this in more shades! Review Title: Meant for lighter skin tones! Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Cutting Scissors Set 10 Pcs Professional Hairdressing Scissors Kit, Hair Cutting Scissors, Thinning Shears, Hair Razor Comb, Clips, Cape, Shears Kit for Home, Salon, Barber Review Date: 2021/05/11 Store: P.travel Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'P.travel', 'Included Components': 'Scissors', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Package Dimensions': '11.2 x 5.5 x 1.5 inches; 11.22 Ounces', 'UPC': '740646020214', 'Manufacturer': 'P.travel'} Review Text: The quality of these items is really not that great. The combs and cape are pretty flimsy and everything feels inexpensive In general. This set would work if you really need it to but it'd be better to just pay slightly more for a better pair of scissors. Review Title: Not the best quality Rating: 2.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step: 1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments 2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases 3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns 4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences Remember to: - Focus only on keywords and trends supported by multiple interactions - Avoid repeating specific product names or details - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: Remy Human Hair Pieces Front Clip in Hair #1B Natural Black Fringe Hair Extensions with Hair Temples Review Date: 2018/10/18 Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Installation Type': 'Clip-In', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '9 x 1 x 1 inches; 0.48 Ounces', 'UPC': '615517482166'} Review Text: I think this might work for people with smaller heads or smaller faces but I felt it wasn’t wider enough or thick enough to look good on me. Review Title: Can also be used as cream blush!:) Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Hair Scrunchies for women,Including 3 Pcs Long Silk Satin Hair Scarf & 3 Pcs Bunny Ear Scrunchies & 3 Pcs Elastic Hair Bands Scrunchy and 7Pcs Pearl Hair Clips,(16Pcs/9Colors) Review Date: 2020/04/10 Store: Suptikes Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Material': 'Pearl, Silk', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'Suptikes', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5 x 5 x 0.7 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 5 x 0.7 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '760635003608'} Review Text: These scrunchies look great in person, especially the plain scrunchies, theyre a beautiful silk like material that has some shine to it. The plain ones also have a heavy duty elastic in them. I have super thick long hair and these do a great job of keeping my hair in a bun.

Ive definitely overpaid for scrunchies at urban outfitters when these are just as nice if not nicer for sooo much cheaper. They're great!:)

The little barettes are just okay, I find they pull my hair but the scrunchies are totally worth it. Review Title: Super cute plus great deal!! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly, Top Japanese Makeup Remover, Gentle Skin Cleanser, Mild Floral Fragrance, Non-Greasy, 7.8 Ounce Review Date: 2020/04/28 Store: Bioré Product Description: ['Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly is a non-greasy makeup remover that removes dirt and impurities from deep below the surface of your skin. This top Japanese makeup remover glides on gently and leaves no sticky residue. Formulated with conditioning beauty essence, this jelly leaves skin feeling moisturized and free of makeup. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.'] Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '1.56 x 2.5 x 7.25 inches; 10.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': '28077_obs', 'UPC': '019100264557', 'Manufacturer': 'Kao USA Inc.'} Review Text: Was interested in what this was going to feel like but I guess "jelly" really is the closest consistency to describe this.

It more viscous than water and has a bit of "bounce" to it but doesn't feel oily or greasy. I apply it straight on my face, rub it in a bit, then add a bit of water to my hands, lather, then rub again. Then rinse k

I have combo skin with drier cheeks and this doesn't leave my skin feeling stripped or dry. Still feels moisturized.

This product smells of roses pretty strongly but I actually love the way it smells so I don't mind at all.

Wouldn't really recommend for eye makeup though, I did find it to sting a bit so I'm just gonna stick to micellar for my eye makeup.

Hope this review helps!:) Review Title: Melts away makeup, smells great Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Queendom Unlashed Mascara | Volumizing and Lengthening | Boosts Lash Length | Vegan, Cruelty Free, Paraben Free Review Date: 2020/06/04 Store: Queendom Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '5.28 x 0.94 x 0.63 inches; 0.85 Ounces'} Review Text: I have pretty long and decently full eyelashes so this mascara worked well for me as a daily mascara.

Cute packaging, nice slim shape with cute design.

I didn't find it to be too volumizing, but it does a good job at defining and lengthening.

Formula was not very wet from first opening so this may dry out faster than others if not used up.

My main issue with this mascara is the hard plastic applicator. It has longer and shorter hard bristles along the sides. I'm by no means a beginner with mascara, but for some reason I've poked my eye with this mascara applicator a couple of times already. The bristles just seem really hard and sharp!

This could just be me having a problem for whatever reason, but thought I'd mention.

Hope this review is helpful! Review Title: Decent mascara but VERY hard pokey applicator! Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Cuckoo Eyelashes 100% handmade 3D Faux Mink Lashes 4 Pairs/set … (Cuckoo 309) Review Date: 2020/06/28 Store: Cuckoo Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Cuckoo', 'Material': 'Silk, Faux Mink', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.91 x 4.33 x 0.39 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.91 x 4.33 x 0.39 inches; 1.87 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Cuckoo 309', 'UPC': '733430907945'} Review Text: (307) These lases are a little more dense so they definitely give the look of wearing false lashes, in kind of a more dated kind of way. I feel like the more spread out and whispy lashes are a lot more trendy these days. Band is quite thick also. Besides the band, the lashes themselves are pretty good quality and don't have a plastic sheen to them which is great. Price and quality is comparable to drugstore.

(309) Also have a thicker band but are much more Whispy and have that fluffy instagram lash to them. Very pretty! I like these a lot better than the 307's. I'd give these a 5 and a 307 a 3 so since they're the same brand, I will average the review to a 4.

Hope this review is helpful! Review Title: Dense, thicker band Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Color Me Cosmetics Gel Manicure Kit with LED Lamp - DIY Gel Nail Starter Set with Prep, Base and Top Coat, 2 Gel Polish Colors & Nail Tools - Beginner Nail Kit with Everything You Need Made in USA* Review Date: 2020/07/30 Store: Color Me Cosmetics Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Color Me Cosmetics', 'Included Components': 'Top Coat, Nail File', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Package Dimensions': '8.6 x 7.6 x 2.7 inches; 1.4 Pounds'} Review Text: The polishes in this set work wonderfully and the packaging is very nice and would make an excellent gift! Unfortunately I bumped the lamp off my table and it fell about 3 feet and stopped working...I didn't think it was much of a fall so I was pretty surprised it didn't turn on anymore.

The lamp was compact and easy to use, fit one hand at a time. Fortunately I have another lamp but pretty bummed this one broke so easily.:/ Review Title: Great little set but unfortunately the light broke very easily:( Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: invisibobble Sprunchie Spiral Hair Ring - True Black - Scrunchie Stylish Bracelet, Strong Elastic Grip Coil Accessories for Women - Gentle for Girls Teens and Thick Hair Review Date: 2020/12/15 Store: invisibobble Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'invisibobble', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Item Weight': '2 Grams', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '2.83 x 2.8 x 0.87 inches; 0.07 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'IB-SP-HP10001'} Review Text: I've tried the regular ones and love those. These don't stretch quite as well and feel a bit tighter when I wrap it around. I think they're alright but I prefer the normal ones much more. Review Title: Prefer the regular ones Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Skinmed Glow Cell BB Cream to Control Sebum with Natural Ingredients 50 ml - 1.7 Ounce Review Date: 2021/02/02 Store: Ph. Drop Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Ph. Drop', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Acne prone,oily,sensitive,all skin types', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.81 x 1.26 x 6.3 inches; 1.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '880128810633'} Review Text: I have a medium tan skin tone and this did not work for me at all. It's waaaay too light. Definitely meant for fair to light medium skin tones. This stuff is pretty pigmented so I wouldn't try it if you think it might be too light. It probably will be. Goes on pretty opaque and pigmented, it's almost a light/medium weight foundation. It does go in silky smooth and has a nice finish. I also like the pump and packaging. A bit of a scent to it, but it's not too bad. Wish they made this in more shades! Review Title: Meant for lighter skin tones! Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Cutting Scissors Set 10 Pcs Professional Hairdressing Scissors Kit, Hair Cutting Scissors, Thinning Shears, Hair Razor Comb, Clips, Cape, Shears Kit for Home, Salon, Barber Review Date: 2021/05/11 Store: P.travel Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'P.travel', 'Included Components': 'Scissors', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Package Dimensions': '11.2 x 5.5 x 1.5 inches; 11.22 Ounces', 'UPC': '740646020214', 'Manufacturer': 'P.travel'} Review Text: The quality of these items is really not that great. The combs and cape are pretty flimsy and everything feels inexpensive In general. This set would work if you really need it to but it'd be better to just pay slightly more for a better pair of scissors. Review Title: Not the best quality Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- Structure your response as: SUMMARY: [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The analysis of purchase history reveals a strong inclination towards beauty and haircare products, emphasizing quality and functionality over brand prestige. The individual's ratings suggest a preference for well-performing items, as indicated by consistently higher scores (above 4.0) for products that meet aesthetic needs, such as makeup sponges and scrunchies. However, sentiments shift notably when products fail to meet expectations, particularly regarding their effectiveness or texture, as with certain hair extensions and cleansing balms, leading to lower ratings.

Common themes include versatile application, with items such as lip products used for dual purposes (lip and cheek). The customer appreciates soft, user-friendly products and demonstrates price sensitivity, favoring value without compromising quality, as exemplified by positive remarks on affordable yet high-quality scrunchies compared to premium alternatives.

Recurring patterns highlight a notable aversion to products that feel greasy or overly complicated in use, suggesting a preference for cleanliness and efficiency in beauty routines. There’s also a clear preference for items that work well across multiple skin tones and types, although some products fell short in shade diversity. Overall, the core preferences reflect a need for soft, effective, versatile, and reasonably priced beauty solutions that enhance rather than complicate daily routines.

target_interaction.title: Tons of styles
target_interaction.text: Tons of styles to choose from ranging from soft glam to dramatic.  Would be great for making gift sets for friends!
target_interaction.title_meta: 3D False Eyelashes 10 Styles Mixed False Lashes Pack,10-15mm Eyelashes Natural Look individual package 10 Pairs
